bike.description: Specialized 100% Cr-Mo, double-butted HT/DT, externally relieved HT, disc mount, 6mm offset horizontal drop out for 26" wheel w/ replaceable der hanger adapter

components.description: Marzocchi DJ 3.5, 100mm, 32mm Cro-Mo stanchions and 1 1/8" steerer, coil spring w/ air assist, rebound adjustment, magnesium lowers, standard axle dropout
Truvativ Hussefelt, forged alloy, 31.8mm, 0 degree rise
Alloy OS, 640mm wide, 45mm rise, 8 degree back, 6 degree up sweep
Avid BB5, mechanical disc, 6" G2 Clean Sweep rotor
Avid BB5, mechanical disc, 6" G2 Clean Sweep rotor
Truvativ Ruktion, 6061, 175mm, Howitzer spline w/ pedal thread inserts
34S w/ poly bash guard and ISCG mounted TV box guide
Truvativ Howitzer XR, sealed cartridge bearings, 73mm Shell for 52mm chainline
Specialized/Alex HRD 26, double wall disc w/ eyelets
Specialized P.Disc, CNC high flanges and disc mounts, 36h, nutted 3/8" axle
Specialized P.Disc, cassette, CNC high flanges and disc mounts, 36h, nutted 3/8" axle
Chain stay protector, reflectors, owners manual
